subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Clarkson won the N.C.A.A. women’s title last month under the husband-and-wife team of Matt and Shannon Desrosiers. But Shannon is stepping down to devote more time to their family.
snippet: Clarkson won the N.C.A.A. women’s title last month under the husband-and-wife team of Matt and Shannon Desrosiers. But Shannon is stepping down to devote more time to their family.
